serial_util package documentation: 
======================================

Contents
--------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   readme_link
   *

Features
--------
- Interactively search and connect to serial ports
- Interfaces inspired by Arduino IDE's serial monitor and plotter

Contributes
------------

- Issue Tracker: https://github.com/t-sasatani/serial-util/issues
- Source Code: https://github.com/t-sasatani/serial-util
